You may not have noticed, but when you're deep in a dream you probably twitch, toss, and turn as your brain shifts to a more active state.
Turns out, you're not so different from how an octopus slee… [+2403 chars]

articles.title: Study reveals how a cat's nose can identify food scents - TheNewsMill
articles.description: Scientists have figured out how cats can locate food, allies and enemies.This research was published in PLoS Computational Biology.A complicated network of tightly coiling bony airway structures is to blame, according to the first thorough investigation of th…

articles.title: You've never seen Mars like this: NASA on pics of Mars - Inshorts
articles.description: NASA shared two images of Mars taken by its Mars Atmosphere and Volatile EvolutioN (MAVEN) spacecraft. "You've never seen Mars like this...Our MAVEN mission got some stunning tie-dye views of Mars in these two ultraviolet images," NASA wrote on Instagram. "MA…
